Rao quadratic entropy (Q) (Rao 1982)

Source: R/raoQ.R
raoQuadratic.Rd

Computes Rao quadratic entropy \(Q\), a diversity measure that accounts for element abundances and their pairwise dissimilarities.

Usage

raoQuadratic(ab, diss)

Arguments

ab

Numeric vector of element abundances.

diss

Numeric square matrix or dist object of pairwise dissimilarities among elements.

Value

Numeric scalar, Rao quadratic entropy \(Q\).

References

  • Rao CR (1982) Diversity and dissimilarity coefficients: A unified approach. Theoretical Population Biology, 21. doi:10.1016/0040-5809(82)90004-1 .
